submission:
class Solution:
    def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        MOD = 10**9+7
        mx = max(nums)
        pref = [x+1 for x in range(mx+1)]
        for i in range(len(nums)-2,-1,-1):
            dp = [0]*(mx+1)
            for j in range(mx+1):
                num2 = nums[i]-j
                if j>nums[i+1]: continue
                lp = max(nums[i+1]-num2,j)
                if lp>nums[i+1]: continue
                curr = pref[nums[i+1]]
                if lp>0:
                    curr-=pref[lp-1]
                dp[j]=curr
            for x in range(1,len(dp)):
                dp[x]+=dp[x-1]
                dp[x]%=MOD
            
            pref = dp
        return pref[-1]
